name: Geometry Hunter
description:
CONTROLS:

-Left click to shoot. Shooting damages enemies and also activates boxes.

-Right click to use the secondary shoot (once you get it).

There are 21 waves of enemies you need to defeat to beat the game. Between waves you get to rest a bit and buy upgrades with the gold you get by killing enemies.

Sounds made with Bfxr

Music made with WolframTones
